meanings.definition: Superlative form of plush, meaning extremely soft and luxurious.
meanings.sent1: The teddy bear felt like the plushiest toy in the store.
meanings.sent2: Her bed was the plushiest one in the entire hotel.
meanings.sent3: The plushiest pillow in the house was always the cat's favorite napping spot.
meanings.sent4: The plushiest blanket wrapped around her like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The plushiest carpet in the room made her feel like she was walking on clouds.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of plush, meaning softer and more luxurious than something else.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the fabrics, velvet felt plushiest against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The new sofa was plushiest compared to the old, worn-out one.
meanings.sent3: The plushiest chair in the room was always reserved for the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: Her plushiest scarf kept her warm on the coldest winter days.
meanings.sent5: The plushiest robe she owned made her feel like royalty when she wore it.
